org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord
Class AeCoordinatingBase

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.coord.AeCoordinatingBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeCoordinating
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeSpCoordinatingBase
public abstract class AeCoordinatingBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeCoordinating

Base class for any object that is participating in a coordinated activity. This class provides a basic framework for managing protocol signals and state transitions.
